attributes.action: abandon plans to build Eco Towns on Greenfield sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Government plans to build 3 million houses by 2020, have resulted in TWO 'Eco Town' proposals south of Selby in North Yorkshire; each is for 15,000 houses.
Both are on Greenfield sites, as are many others around the country - which is not 'eco.'
None are supported by local people.
We demand the Government abandon this non-eco plan and re-think the entire policy, in consultation with local people.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "abandon plans to build Eco Towns on Greenfield sites."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18287


Prime Minister's Office
